comment_body: So, there you are!!! We finally meet! It's your fault, huh? I've been looking for you for a very, very long time! I knew that I had help after I made one wrong decision, just one tiny wrong choice and then WHAM, the life I knew was gone! I couldn't believe how fast my life fell apart! I ended up feeling lost and alone at the end of the world; shattered into bits! But, I guess you have your limits of bad because you finally dumped me. You had to have disappeared from my life, because after a long time of misery and pain, my life finally turned around! Today, I am happy and at peace. I can say I made it back! All because of the one thing you can not fight against and that is hope. I never gave up hope! Now, I can say it to your face! Good bye wrong turn... good bye...
I also took a wrong turn and came here. Now, I'm glad I did.
I wouldn't call this scary, but it's thought provoking. Well done!
